meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a basic unit
meanings.sent1: I found a centesimo on the ground.
meanings.sent2: She saved every centesimo she earned.
meanings.sent3: The centesimo rolled away, causing a comical chase.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was worth every centesimo.
meanings.sent5: The shiny centesimo sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: One hundredth part of a unit of currency
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his dollars for centesimos.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepted centesimos.
meanings.sent3: The centesimo jumped out of the wallet, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a rare centesimo in a sea of coins.
meanings.sent5: The centesimo was the smallest coin in the collection.
